Articles.Content: Hey I'm pretty new to the forum, but I've been playing ksp for a while! lol
Hey there DwindlingSovereignty, welcome to the forums! I'm sure you'll find your way around here

Great to know you're experienced! Most people need get-me-started tips with more advanced KSP stuff, but if you need any help, feel free to PM me.

PS: If you're rocket is randomly exploding, try using a pilot OTHER than Jeb.
